name: Weight after weight loss
instruction:
![](https://course-qa-basics.s3.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/section-2-course-5-task-15.png)

With proper diet and exercise, Claudia managed to lose 25 pounds.
How much does she weigh now?

Create a variable `klaudiaWeight` with a value of `220`.

Write a command that decreases the existing value of the `klaudiaWeight` variable by `25`.
